Hiroki Ouchi / 大内 啓樹

Profile

  • Assistant Professor
    Natural Language Processing Laboratory, Nara Institute of Science and Technology
  • Contact Info
    Email: hiroki.ouchi [at] is.naist.jp
    Account: Google Scholar, researchmap, Twitter, Research Gate, Github, Twitter

Addressee and Response Selection for Multi-Party Conversation from ACL on Vimeo.

Research Interests

  • Geography & Language
    Currently, I am very interested in the intersection between Geographic Information Science (GIS) and Natural Language Processing (NLP). In order to reach the potential of the two fields, our Geography & Language project tries to connect between maps and text; i.e., grounding location-related expressions onto a map.
  • Natural Language Processing
    Semantic Parsing, Syntactic Parsing, Named Entity Recognition
  • Machine Learning
    Structured Prediction, Transductive Learning, Semi-Supervised Learning
